name: Book Writing Agent (LangGraph)
description: A simple book writing agent using LangGraph that creates a complete book by generating an outline and writing all chapters. Uses search tools (Tavily, SerpAPI, Serper, or DuckDuckGo) for research and exploration. Supports both OpenAI and Azure OpenAI. Configure search via environment variables: TAVILY_API_KEY (preferred), SERPAPI_API_KEY, SERPER_API_KEY, or DuckDuckGo (default, no key needed). Configure Azure via environment variables (AZURE_API_KEY, AZURE_API_BASE) or input parameters.
author: AgentHub Team

functions.name: execute
functions.description: Write a complete book by generating an outline and writing all chapters

topic.description: The main topic of the book

goal.description: The author's desired goal or vision for the book

model_name.description: Model to use for LLM. For OpenAI: gpt-4o-mini, gpt-3.5-turbo, gpt-4, gpt-4o. For Azure: deployment name (e.g., gpt-4o-mini-2024-07-18)

use_azure.description: Whether to use Azure OpenAI (requires azure_api_key and azure_endpoint)

azure_api_key.description: Azure OpenAI API key (optional if AZURE_API_KEY env var is set)

azure_endpoint.description: Azure OpenAI endpoint URL (optional if AZURE_API_BASE or AZURE_ENDPOINT env var is set)

recursion_limit.description: Maximum number of workflow steps (default: 100, increase if you have many chapters)

result.description: The result of the book writing operation

book.description: Complete book in LaTeX format with all chapters

outline.description: Generated book outline in plain text format

tex_file.description: Path to the saved .tex file on the filesystem

error.description: Error message when status is error
